from ( SELECT
from itcast_auth_menu where is_enable = true and is_public = true
and application_id = #{applicationId}

from itcast_auth_menu where is_enable = true and is_public = false
and application_id = #{applicationId}
and id in ( SELECT distinct authority_id FROM itcast_auth_role_authority ra INNER JOIN itcast_auth_user_role ur on ra.role_id = ur.role_id INNER JOIN itcast_auth_role r on r.id = ra.role_id where ur.user_id = #{userId, jdbcType=BIGINT} and r.status = true and ra.authority_type = 'MENU' ) ) tmp ORDER BY sort_value asc
